thread.title: Gino Announces To Share Free Food At Akwaaba Village To Climax Afua Asantewaa Sing-A-Thon - YEN.COM.GH
thread.title_full: Gino Announces To Share Free Food At Akwaaba Village To Climax Afua Asantewaa Sing-A-Thon - YEN.COM.GH

author: Augustine Fenuku
title: Gino Announces To Share Free Food At Akwaaba Village To Climax Afua Asantewaa Sing-A-Thon - YEN.COM.GH
text: Gino Announces To Share Free Food At Akwaaba Village To Climax Afua Asantewaa Sing-A-Thon - Gino has announced on their social media platform that they will be sharing food to everyone present at the Akwaaba Village tonight - The trusted food brand believes those who have come out in their numbers to support Afua Asantewaa must not do so with an empty stomach - They said they will share a bowl of Jollof or goat light soup at the venue so they are entreating everyone to come prepared PAY ATTENTION: [YEN Entertainment Awards 2023 VOTING is officially underway!](https://corp.yen.com.gh/yen-awards#) Gino, the trusted food brand has announced on their social media that they will be sharing food with everyone present at the Akwaaba Village tonight. Afua Asantewaa who is on the verge of setting a new [world](https://yen.com.gh/world/) record has won the love and admiration of all and Gino wants to reward all those who have taken time out of their day to troop in the Akwaaba Village and show their support a plate of Jollof and a bowl of goat meat light soup This news has many [social media](https://yen.com.gh/194085-social-media-the-good-bad-ugly-a-yen-gh-feature.html) users excited as many have commented they will be at the grounds today to give their support. Gino’s announcement The announcement comes at the back of the stellar achievement by Afua Asantewaa. Her Strength, determination, and poise have won the hearts of many. For a feat that seemed impossible, she has shown that with a determined spirit, one can achieve anything. [ Gino](https://www.tomatonews.com/en/ghana-gbfoods-expands-its-factory_2_1973.html#:~:text=GBfoods%2C%20a%20leading%20food%20manufacturing,tomato%20canning%20line%20in%20Tema.) has taken this message Afua is sharing and taken it upon themselves to feed everyone who will come out to support her tonight. PAY ATTENTION: [Click “See First” under the “Following” tab to see YEN.com.gh News on your News Feed!](https://yen.com.gh/188918-new-facebook-algorithm-how-yen-news-newsfeed-now.html) Empty stomach support de3 daabi da! Get yourself a free bowl of #Ginofied Jollof or goat light soup and let's power up for the final hours of Afua Asantewaa's attempt to set a new Guinness World Record. See you at the Akwaaba village! View [Post](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1Yw2G2iS4Q/) Below Social media reaction to this announcement Here are some captions made by some Ghanaians online: @arcosualona commented: We all go turn up @colnx commented: And I must be there @inspirers_hope_with_emefa commented: I'm coming oooo The little girl who starred in the Gino advert over a decade ago is all grown up Meanwhile, yen.com.gh reported that the [young girl who starred in Gino's advert](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/celebrities/230570-little-girl-featured-gino-advert-a-decade-grows-tall/) “Gino Truly Cares” over a decade ago has grown into a stunning young lady. The young lady is the daughter of renowned actor Majid Michel. The once-tiny girl captured the hearts of viewers in [Ghana](https://yen.com.gh/ghana/) with her infectious energy and heartwarming performance.
